4299/**
4300 * _base_get_port_facts - obtain port facts reply and save in ioc
4301 * @ioc: per adapter object
4302 *
4303 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
4304 */
4305static int
4306_base_get_port_facts(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc, int port)
4307{
4308 Mpi2PortFactsRequest_t mpi_request;
4309 Mpi2PortFactsReply_t mpi_reply;
4310 struct mpt3sas_port_facts *pfacts;
4311 int mpi_reply_sz, mpi_request_sz, r;
4312
4313 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
4314 __func__));
4315
4316 mpi_reply_sz = sizeof(Mpi2PortFactsReply_t);
4317 mpi_request_sz = sizeof(Mpi2PortFactsRequest_t);
4318 memset(&mpi_request, 0, mpi_request_sz);
4319 mpi_request.Function = MPI2_FUNCTION_PORT_FACTS;
4320 mpi_request.PortNumber = port;
4321 r = _base_handshake_req_reply_wait(ioc, mpi_request_sz,
4322 (u32 *)&mpi_request, mpi_reply_sz, (u16 *)&mpi_reply, 5);
4323
4324 if (r != 0) {
4325 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: handshake failed (r=%d)\n",
4326 ioc->name, __func__, r);
4327 return r;
4328 }
4329
4330 pfacts = &ioc->pfacts[port];
4331 memset(pfacts, 0, sizeof(struct mpt3sas_port_facts));
4332 pfacts->PortNumber = mpi_reply.PortNumber;
4333 pfacts->VP_ID = mpi_reply.VP_ID;
4334 pfacts->VF_ID = mpi_reply.VF_ID;
4335 pfacts->MaxPostedCmdBuffers =
4336 le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.MaxPostedCmdBuffers);
4337
4338 return 0;
4339}
4340
4341/**
4342 * _base_wait_for_iocstate - Wait until the card is in READY or OPERATIONAL
4343 * @ioc: per adapter object
4344 * @timeout:
4345 *
4346 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
4347 */
4348static int
4349_base_wait_for_iocstate(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc, int timeout)
4350{
4351 u32 ioc_state;
4352 int rc;
4353
4354 dinitprintk(ioc, printk(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
4355 __func__));
4356
4357 if (ioc->pci_error_recovery) {
4358 dfailprintk(ioc, printk(MPT3SAS_FMT
4359 "%s: host in pci error recovery\n", ioc->name, __func__));
4360 return -EFAULT;
4361 }
4362
4363 ioc_state = mpt3sas_base_get_iocstate(ioc, 0);
4364 dhsprintk(ioc, printk(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: ioc_state(0x%08x)\n",
4365 ioc->name, __func__, ioc_state));
4366
4367 if (((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) == MPI2_IOC_STATE_READY) ||
4368 (ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) == MPI2_IOC_STATE_OPERATIONAL)
4369 return 0;
4370
4371 if (ioc_state & MPI2_DOORBELL_USED) {
4372 dhsprintk(ioc, printk(MPT3SAS_FMT
4373 "unexpected doorbell active!\n", ioc->name));
4374 goto issue_diag_reset;
4375 }
4376
4377 if ((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) == MPI2_IOC_STATE_FAULT) {
4378 mpt3sas_base_fault_info(ioc, ioc_state &
4379 MPI2_DOORBELL_DATA_MASK);
4380 goto issue_diag_reset;
4381 }
4382
4383 ioc_state = _base_wait_on_iocstate(ioc, MPI2_IOC_STATE_READY, timeout);
4384 if (ioc_state) {
4385 dfailprintk(ioc, printk(MPT3SAS_FMT
4386 "%s: failed going to ready state (ioc_state=0x%x)\n",
4387 ioc->name, __func__, ioc_state));
4388 return -EFAULT;
4389 }
4390
4391 issue_diag_reset:
4392 rc = _base_diag_reset(ioc);
4393 return rc;
4394}
4395
4396/**
4397 * _base_get_ioc_facts - obtain ioc facts reply and save in ioc
4398 * @ioc: per adapter object
4399 *
4400 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
4401 */
4402static int
4403_base_get_ioc_facts(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
4404{
4405 Mpi2IOCFactsRequest_t mpi_request;
4406 Mpi2IOCFactsReply_t mpi_reply;
4407 struct mpt3sas_facts *facts;
4408 int mpi_reply_sz, mpi_request_sz, r;
4409
4410 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
4411 __func__));
4412
4413 r = _base_wait_for_iocstate(ioc, 10);
4414 if (r) {
4415 dfailprintk(ioc, printk(MPT3SAS_FMT
4416 "%s: failed getting to correct state\n",
4417 ioc->name, __func__));
4418 return r;
4419 }
4420 mpi_reply_sz = sizeof(Mpi2IOCFactsReply_t);
4421 mpi_request_sz = sizeof(Mpi2IOCFactsRequest_t);
4422 memset(&mpi_request, 0, mpi_request_sz);
4423 mpi_request.Function = MPI2_FUNCTION_IOC_FACTS;
4424 r = _base_handshake_req_reply_wait(ioc, mpi_request_sz,
4425 (u32 *)&mpi_request, mpi_reply_sz, (u16 *)&mpi_reply, 5);
4426
4427 if (r != 0) {
4428 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: handshake failed (r=%d)\n",
4429 ioc->name, __func__, r);
4430 return r;
4431 }
4432
4433 facts = &ioc->facts;
4434 memset(facts, 0, sizeof(struct mpt3sas_facts));
4435 facts->MsgVersion = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.MsgVersion);
4436 facts->HeaderVersion = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.HeaderVersion);
4437 facts->VP_ID = mpi_reply.VP_ID;
4438 facts->VF_ID = mpi_reply.VF_ID;
4439 facts->IOCExceptions = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.IOCExceptions);
4440 facts->MaxChainDepth = mpi_reply.MaxChainDepth;
4441 facts->WhoInit = mpi_reply.WhoInit;
4442 facts->NumberOfPorts = mpi_reply.NumberOfPorts;
4443 facts->MaxMSIxVectors = mpi_reply.MaxMSIxVectors;
4444 facts->RequestCredit = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.RequestCredit);
4445 facts->MaxReplyDescriptorPostQueueDepth =
4446 le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.MaxReplyDescriptorPostQueueDepth);
4447 facts->ProductID = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.ProductID);
4448 facts->IOCCapabilities = le32_to_cpu(mpi_reply.IOCCapabilities);
4449 if ((facts->IOCCapabilities & MPI2_IOCFACTS_CAPABILITY_INTEGRATED_RAID))
4450 ioc->ir_firmware = 1;
4451 if ((facts->IOCCapabilities &
4452 MPI2_IOCFACTS_CAPABILITY_RDPQ_ARRAY_CAPABLE))
4453 ioc->rdpq_array_capable = 1;
4454 if (facts->IOCCapabilities & MPI26_IOCFACTS_CAPABILITY_ATOMIC_REQ)
4455 ioc->atomic_desc_capable = 1;
4456 facts->FWVersion.Word = le32_to_cpu(mpi_reply.FWVersion.Word);
4457 facts->IOCRequestFrameSize =
4458 le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.IOCRequestFrameSize);
4459 if (ioc->hba_mpi_version_belonged != MPI2_VERSION) {
4460 facts->IOCMaxChainSegmentSize =
4461 le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.IOCMaxChainSegmentSize);
4462 }
4463 facts->MaxInitiators = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.MaxInitiators);
4464 facts->MaxTargets = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.MaxTargets);
4465 ioc->shost->max_id = -1;
4466 facts->MaxSasExpanders = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.MaxSasExpanders);
4467 facts->MaxEnclosures = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.MaxEnclosures);
4468 facts->ProtocolFlags = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.ProtocolFlags);
4469 facts->HighPriorityCredit =
4470 le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.HighPriorityCredit);
4471 facts->ReplyFrameSize = mpi_reply.ReplyFrameSize;
4472 facts->MaxDevHandle = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.MaxDevHandle);
4473
4474 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
4475 "hba queue depth(%d), max chains per io(%d)\n",
4476 ioc->name, facts->RequestCredit,
4477 facts->MaxChainDepth));
4478 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
4479 "request frame size(%d), reply frame size(%d)\n", ioc->name,
4480 facts->IOCRequestFrameSize * 4, facts->ReplyFrameSize * 4));
4481 return 0;
4482}
4483
4484/**
4485 * _base_send_ioc_init - send ioc_init to firmware
4486 * @ioc: per adapter object
4487 *
4488 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
4489 */
4490static int
4491_base_send_ioc_init(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
4492{
4493 Mpi2IOCInitRequest_t mpi_request;
4494 Mpi2IOCInitReply_t mpi_reply;
4495 int i, r = 0;
4496 ktime_t current_time;
4497 u16 ioc_status;
4498 u32 reply_post_free_array_sz = 0;
4499 Mpi2IOCInitRDPQArrayEntry *reply_post_free_array = NULL;
4500 dma_addr_t reply_post_free_array_dma;
4501
4502 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
4503 __func__));
4504
4505 memset(&mpi_request, 0, sizeof(Mpi2IOCInitRequest_t));
4506 mpi_request.Function = MPI2_FUNCTION_IOC_INIT;
4507 mpi_request.WhoInit = MPI2_WHOINIT_HOST_DRIVER;
4508 mpi_request.VF_ID = 0; /* TODO */
4509 mpi_request.VP_ID = 0;
4510 mpi_request.MsgVersion = cpu_to_le16(ioc->hba_mpi_version_belonged);
4511 mpi_request.HeaderVersion = cpu_to_le16(MPI2_HEADER_VERSION);
4512
4513 if (_base_is_controller_msix_enabled(ioc))
4514 mpi_request.HostMSIxVectors = ioc->reply_queue_count;
4515 mpi_request.SystemRequestFrameSize = cpu_to_le16(ioc->request_sz/4);
4516 mpi_request.ReplyDescriptorPostQueueDepth =
4517 cpu_to_le16(ioc->reply_post_queue_depth);
4518 mpi_request.ReplyFreeQueueDepth =
4519 cpu_to_le16(ioc->reply_free_queue_depth);
4520
4521 mpi_request.SenseBufferAddressHigh =
4522 cpu_to_le32((u64)ioc->sense_dma >> 32);
4523 mpi_request.SystemReplyAddressHigh =
4524 cpu_to_le32((u64)ioc->reply_dma >> 32);
4525 mpi_request.SystemRequestFrameBaseAddress =
4526 cpu_to_le64((u64)ioc->request_dma);
4527 mpi_request.ReplyFreeQueueAddress =
4528 cpu_to_le64((u64)ioc->reply_free_dma);
4529
4530 if (ioc->rdpq_array_enable) {
4531 reply_post_free_array_sz = ioc->reply_queue_count *
4532 sizeof(Mpi2IOCInitRDPQArrayEntry);
4533 reply_post_free_array = pci_alloc_consistent(ioc->pdev,
4534 reply_post_free_array_sz, &reply_post_free_array_dma);
4535 if (!reply_post_free_array) {
4536 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT
4537 "reply_post_free_array: pci_alloc_consistent failed\n",
4538 ioc->name);
4539 r = -ENOMEM;
4540 goto out;
4541 }
4542 memset(reply_post_free_array, 0, reply_post_free_array_sz);
4543 for (i = 0; i < ioc->reply_queue_count; i++)
4544 reply_post_free_array[i].RDPQBaseAddress =
4545 cpu_to_le64(
4546 (u64)ioc->reply_post[i].reply_post_free_dma);
4547 mpi_request.MsgFlags = MPI2_IOCINIT_MSGFLAG_RDPQ_ARRAY_MODE;
4548 mpi_request.ReplyDescriptorPostQueueAddress =
4549 cpu_to_le64((u64)reply_post_free_array_dma);
4550 } else {
4551 mpi_request.ReplyDescriptorPostQueueAddress =
4552 cpu_to_le64((u64)ioc->reply_post[0].reply_post_free_dma);
4553 }
4554
4555 /* This time stamp specifies number of milliseconds
4556 * since epoch ~ midnight January 1, 1970.
4557 */
4558 current_time = ktime_get_real();
4559 mpi_request.TimeStamp = cpu_to_le64(ktime_to_ms(current_time));
4560
4561 if (ioc->logging_level & MPT_DEBUG_INIT) {
4562 __le32 *mfp;
4563 int i;
4564
4565 mfp = (__le32 *)&mpi_request;
4566 pr_info("\toffset:data\n");
4567 for (i = 0; i < sizeof(Mpi2IOCInitRequest_t)/4; i++)
4568 pr_info("\t[0x%02x]:%08x\n", i*4,
4569 le32_to_cpu(mfp[i]));
4570 }
4571
4572 r = _base_handshake_req_reply_wait(ioc,
4573 sizeof(Mpi2IOCInitRequest_t), (u32 *)&mpi_request,
4574 sizeof(Mpi2IOCInitReply_t), (u16 *)&mpi_reply, 10);
4575
4576 if (r != 0) {
4577 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: handshake failed (r=%d)\n",
4578 ioc->name, __func__, r);
4579 goto out;
4580 }
4581
4582 ioc_status = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply.IOCStatus) & MPI2_IOCSTATUS_MASK;
4583 if (ioc_status != MPI2_IOCSTATUS_SUCCESS ||
4584 mpi_reply.IOCLogInfo) {
4585 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: failed\n", ioc->name, __func__);
4586 r = -EIO;
4587 }
4588
4589out:
4590 if (reply_post_free_array)
4591 pci_free_consistent(ioc->pdev, reply_post_free_array_sz,
4592 reply_post_free_array,
4593 reply_post_free_array_dma);
4594 return r;
4595}
4596
4597/**
4598 * mpt3sas_port_enable_done - command completion routine for port enable
4599 * @ioc: per adapter object
4600 * @smid: system request message index
4601 * @msix_index: MSIX table index supplied by the OS
4602 * @reply: reply message frame(lower 32bit addr)
4603 *
4604 * Return 1 meaning mf should be freed from _base_interrupt
4605 * 0 means the mf is freed from this function.
4606 */
4607u8
4608mpt3sas_port_enable_done(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc, u16 smid, u8 msix_index,
4609 u32 reply)
4610{
4611 MPI2DefaultReply_t *mpi_reply;
4612 u16 ioc_status;
4613
4614 if (ioc->port_enable_cmds.status == MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED)
4615 return 1;
4616
4617 mpi_reply = mpt3sas_base_get_reply_virt_addr(ioc, reply);
4618 if (!mpi_reply)
4619 return 1;
4620
4621 if (mpi_reply->Function != MPI2_FUNCTION_PORT_ENABLE)
4622 return 1;
4623
4624 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status &= ~MPT3_CMD_PENDING;
4625 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status |= MPT3_CMD_COMPLETE;
4626 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status |= MPT3_CMD_REPLY_VALID;
4627 memcpy(ioc->port_enable_cmds.reply, mpi_reply, mpi_reply->MsgLength*4);
4628 ioc_status = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply->IOCStatus) & MPI2_IOCSTATUS_MASK;
4629 if (ioc_status != MPI2_IOCSTATUS_SUCCESS)
4630 ioc->port_enable_failed = 1;
4631
4632 if (ioc->is_driver_loading) {
4633 if (ioc_status == MPI2_IOCSTATUS_SUCCESS) {
4634 mpt3sas_port_enable_complete(ioc);
4635 return 1;
4636 } else {
4637 ioc->start_scan_failed = ioc_status;
4638 ioc->start_scan = 0;
4639 return 1;
4640 }
4641 }
4642 complete(&ioc->port_enable_cmds.done);
4643 return 1;
4644}
4645
4646/**
4647 * _base_send_port_enable - send port_enable(discovery stuff) to firmware
4648 * @ioc: per adapter object
4649 *
4650 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
4651 */
4652static int
4653_base_send_port_enable(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
4654{
4655 Mpi2PortEnableRequest_t *mpi_request;
4656 Mpi2PortEnableReply_t *mpi_reply;
4657 int r = 0;
4658 u16 smid;
4659 u16 ioc_status;
4660
4661 pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "sending port enable !!\n", ioc->name);
4662
4663 if (ioc->port_enable_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_PENDING) {
4664 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: internal command already in use\n",
4665 ioc->name, __func__);
4666 return -EAGAIN;
4667 }
4668
4669 smid = mpt3sas_base_get_smid(ioc, ioc->port_enable_cb_idx);
4670 if (!smid) {
4671 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: failed obtaining a smid\n",
4672 ioc->name, __func__);
4673 return -EAGAIN;
4674 }
4675
4676 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_PENDING;
4677 mpi_request = mpt3sas_base_get_msg_frame(ioc, smid);
4678 ioc->port_enable_cmds.smid = smid;
4679 memset(mpi_request, 0, sizeof(Mpi2PortEnableRequest_t));
4680 mpi_request->Function = MPI2_FUNCTION_PORT_ENABLE;
4681
4682 init_completion(&ioc->port_enable_cmds.done);
4683 ioc->put_smid_default(ioc, smid);
4684 wait_for_completion_timeout(&ioc->port_enable_cmds.done, 300*HZ);
4685 if (!(ioc->port_enable_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_COMPLETE)) {
4686 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: timeout\n",
4687 ioc->name, __func__);
4688 _debug_dump_mf(mpi_request,
4689 sizeof(Mpi2PortEnableRequest_t)/4);
4690 if (ioc->port_enable_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_RESET)
4691 r = -EFAULT;
4692 else
4693 r = -ETIME;
4694 goto out;
4695 }
4696
4697 mpi_reply = ioc->port_enable_cmds.reply;
4698 ioc_status = le16_to_cpu(mpi_reply->IOCStatus) & MPI2_IOCSTATUS_MASK;
4699 if (ioc_status != MPI2_IOCSTATUS_SUCCESS) {
4700 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: failed with (ioc_status=0x%08x)\n",
4701 ioc->name, __func__, ioc_status);
4702 r = -EFAULT;
4703 goto out;
4704 }
4705
4706 out:
4707 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
4708 pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "port enable: %s\n", ioc->name, ((r == 0) ?
4709 "SUCCESS" : "FAILED"));
4710 return r;
4711}
4712
4713/**
4714 * mpt3sas_port_enable - initiate firmware discovery (don't wait for reply)
4715 * @ioc: per adapter object
4716 *
4717 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
4718 */
4719int
4720mpt3sas_port_enable(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
4721{
4722 Mpi2PortEnableRequest_t *mpi_request;
4723 u16 smid;
4724
4725 pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "sending port enable !!\n", ioc->name);
4726
4727 if (ioc->port_enable_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_PENDING) {
4728 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: internal command already in use\n",
4729 ioc->name, __func__);
4730 return -EAGAIN;
4731 }
4732
4733 smid = mpt3sas_base_get_smid(ioc, ioc->port_enable_cb_idx);
4734 if (!smid) {
4735 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: failed obtaining a smid\n",
4736 ioc->name, __func__);
4737 return -EAGAIN;
4738 }
4739
4740 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_PENDING;
4741 mpi_request = mpt3sas_base_get_msg_frame(ioc, smid);
4742 ioc->port_enable_cmds.smid = smid;
4743 memset(mpi_request, 0, sizeof(Mpi2PortEnableRequest_t));
4744 mpi_request->Function = MPI2_FUNCTION_PORT_ENABLE;
4745
4746 ioc->put_smid_default(ioc, smid);
4747 return 0;
4748}
4749
4750/**
4751 * _base_determine_wait_on_discovery - desposition
4752 * @ioc: per adapter object
4753 *
4754 * Decide whether to wait on discovery to complete. Used to either
4755 * locate boot device, or report volumes ahead of physical devices.
4756 *
4757 * Returns 1 for wait, 0 for don't wait
4758 */
4759static int
4760_base_determine_wait_on_discovery(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
4761{
4762 /* We wait for discovery to complete if IR firmware is loaded.
4763 * The sas topology events arrive before PD events, so we need time to
4764 * turn on the bit in ioc->pd_handles to indicate PD
4765 * Also, it maybe required to report Volumes ahead of physical
4766 * devices when MPI2_IOCPAGE8_IRFLAGS_LOW_VOLUME_MAPPING is set.
4767 */
4768 if (ioc->ir_firmware)
4769 return 1;
4770
4771 /* if no Bios, then we don't need to wait */
4772 if (!ioc->bios_pg3.BiosVersion)
4773 return 0;
4774
4775 /* Bios is present, then we drop down here.
4776 *
4777 * If there any entries in the Bios Page 2, then we wait
4778 * for discovery to complete.
4779 */
4780
4781 /* Current Boot Device */
4782 if ((ioc->bios_pg2.CurrentBootDeviceForm &
4783 MPI2_BIOSPAGE2_FORM_MASK) ==
4784 MPI2_BIOSPAGE2_FORM_NO_DEVICE_SPECIFIED &&
4785 /* Request Boot Device */
4786 (ioc->bios_pg2.ReqBootDeviceForm &
4787 MPI2_BIOSPAGE2_FORM_MASK) ==
4788 MPI2_BIOSPAGE2_FORM_NO_DEVICE_SPECIFIED &&
4789 /* Alternate Request Boot Device */
4790 (ioc->bios_pg2.ReqAltBootDeviceForm &
4791 MPI2_BIOSPAGE2_FORM_MASK) ==
4792 MPI2_BIOSPAGE2_FORM_NO_DEVICE_SPECIFIED)
4793 return 0;
4794
4795 return 1;
4796}
4797
4798/**
4799 * _base_unmask_events - turn on notification for this event
4800 * @ioc: per adapter object
4801 * @event: firmware event
4802 *
4803 * The mask is stored in ioc->event_masks.
4804 */
4805static void
4806_base_unmask_events(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc, u16 event)
4807{
4808 u32 desired_event;
4809
4810 if (event >= 128)
4811 return;
4812
4813 desired_event = (1 << (event % 32));
4814
4815 if (event < 32)
4816 ioc->event_masks[0] &= ~desired_event;
4817 else if (event < 64)
4818 ioc->event_masks[1] &= ~desired_event;
4819 else if (event < 96)
4820 ioc->event_masks[2] &= ~desired_event;
4821 else if (event < 128)
4822 ioc->event_masks[3] &= ~desired_event;
4823}
4824
4825/**
4826 * _base_event_notification - send event notification
4827 * @ioc: per adapter object
4828 *
4829 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
4830 */
4831static int
4832_base_event_notification(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
4833{
4834 Mpi2EventNotificationRequest_t *mpi_request;
4835 u16 smid;
4836 int r = 0;
4837 int i;
4838
4839 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
4840 __func__));
4841
4842 if (ioc->base_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_PENDING) {
4843 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: internal command already in use\n",
4844 ioc->name, __func__);
4845 return -EAGAIN;
4846 }
4847
4848 smid = mpt3sas_base_get_smid(ioc, ioc->base_cb_idx);
4849 if (!smid) {
4850 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: failed obtaining a smid\n",
4851 ioc->name, __func__);
4852 return -EAGAIN;
4853 }
4854 ioc->base_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_PENDING;
4855 mpi_request = mpt3sas_base_get_msg_frame(ioc, smid);
4856 ioc->base_cmds.smid = smid;
4857 memset(mpi_request, 0, sizeof(Mpi2EventNotificationRequest_t));
4858 mpi_request->Function = MPI2_FUNCTION_EVENT_NOTIFICATION;
4859 mpi_request->VF_ID = 0; /* TODO */
4860 mpi_request->VP_ID = 0;
4861 for (i = 0; i < MPI2_EVENT_NOTIFY_EVENTMASK_WORDS; i++)
4862 mpi_request->EventMasks[i] =
4863 cpu_to_le32(ioc->event_masks[i]);
4864 init_completion(&ioc->base_cmds.done);
4865 ioc->put_smid_default(ioc, smid);
4866 wait_for_completion_timeout(&ioc->base_cmds.done, 30*HZ);
4867 if (!(ioc->base_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_COMPLETE)) {
4868 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: timeout\n",
4869 ioc->name, __func__);
4870 _debug_dump_mf(mpi_request,
4871 sizeof(Mpi2EventNotificationRequest_t)/4);
4872 if (ioc->base_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_RESET)
4873 r = -EFAULT;
4874 else
4875 r = -ETIME;
4876 } else
4877 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: complete\n",
4878 ioc->name, __func__));
4879 ioc->base_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
4880 return r;
4881}
4882
4883/**
4884 * mpt3sas_base_validate_event_type - validating event types
4885 * @ioc: per adapter object
4886 * @event: firmware event
4887 *
4888 * This will turn on firmware event notification when application
4889 * ask for that event. We don't mask events that are already enabled.
4890 */
4891void
4892mpt3sas_base_validate_event_type(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc, u32 *event_type)
4893{
4894 int i, j;
4895 u32 event_mask, desired_event;
4896 u8 send_update_to_fw;
4897
4898 for (i = 0, send_update_to_fw = 0; i <
4899 MPI2_EVENT_NOTIFY_EVENTMASK_WORDS; i++) {
4900 event_mask = ~event_type[i];
4901 desired_event = 1;
4902 for (j = 0; j < 32; j++) {
4903 if (!(event_mask & desired_event) &&
4904 (ioc->event_masks[i] & desired_event)) {
4905 ioc->event_masks[i] &= ~desired_event;
4906 send_update_to_fw = 1;
4907 }
4908 desired_event = (desired_event << 1);
4909 }
4910 }
4911
4912 if (!send_update_to_fw)
4913 return;
4914
4915 mutex_lock(&ioc->base_cmds.mutex);
4916 _base_event_notification(ioc);
4917 mutex_unlock(&ioc->base_cmds.mutex);
4918}
4919
4920/**
4921 * _base_diag_reset - the "big hammer" start of day reset
4922 * @ioc: per adapter object
4923 *
4924 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
4925 */
4926static int
4927_base_diag_reset(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
4928{
4929 u32 host_diagnostic;
4930 u32 ioc_state;
4931 u32 count;
4932 u32 hcb_size;
4933
4934 pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "sending diag reset !!\n", ioc->name);
4935
4936 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "clear interrupts\n",
4937 ioc->name));
4938
4939 count = 0;
4940 do {
4941 /* Write magic sequence to WriteSequence register
4942 * Loop until in diagnostic mode
4943 */
4944 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
4945 "write magic sequence\n", ioc->name));
4946 writel(MPI2_WRSEQ_FLUSH_KEY_VALUE, &ioc->chip->WriteSequence);
4947 writel(MPI2_WRSEQ_1ST_KEY_VALUE, &ioc->chip->WriteSequence);
4948 writel(MPI2_WRSEQ_2ND_KEY_VALUE, &ioc->chip->WriteSequence);
4949 writel(MPI2_WRSEQ_3RD_KEY_VALUE, &ioc->chip->WriteSequence);
4950 writel(MPI2_WRSEQ_4TH_KEY_VALUE, &ioc->chip->WriteSequence);
4951 writel(MPI2_WRSEQ_5TH_KEY_VALUE, &ioc->chip->WriteSequence);
4952 writel(MPI2_WRSEQ_6TH_KEY_VALUE, &ioc->chip->WriteSequence);
4953
4954 /* wait 100 msec */
4955 msleep(100);
4956
4957 if (count++ > 20)
4958 goto out;
4959
4960 host_diagnostic = readl(&ioc->chip->HostDiagnostic);
4961 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
4962 "wrote magic sequence: count(%d), host_diagnostic(0x%08x)\n",
4963 ioc->name, count, host_diagnostic));
4964
4965 } while ((host_diagnostic & MPI2_DIAG_DIAG_WRITE_ENABLE) == 0);
4966
4967 hcb_size = readl(&ioc->chip->HCBSize);
4968
4969 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "diag reset: issued\n",
4970 ioc->name));
4971 writel(host_diagnostic | MPI2_DIAG_RESET_ADAPTER,
4972 &ioc->chip->HostDiagnostic);
4973
4974 /*This delay allows the chip PCIe hardware time to finish reset tasks*/
4975 msleep(MPI2_HARD_RESET_PCIE_FIRST_READ_DELAY_MICRO_SEC/1000);
4976
4977 /* Approximately 300 second max wait */
4978 for (count = 0; count < (300000000 /
4979 MPI2_HARD_RESET_PCIE_SECOND_READ_DELAY_MICRO_SEC); count++) {
4980
4981 host_diagnostic = readl(&ioc->chip->HostDiagnostic);
4982
4983 if (host_diagnostic == 0xFFFFFFFF)
4984 goto out;
4985 if (!(host_diagnostic & MPI2_DIAG_RESET_ADAPTER))
4986 break;
4987
4988 msleep(MPI2_HARD_RESET_PCIE_SECOND_READ_DELAY_MICRO_SEC / 1000);
4989 }
4990
4991 if (host_diagnostic & MPI2_DIAG_HCB_MODE) {
4992
4993 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
4994 "restart the adapter assuming the HCB Address points to good F/W\n",
4995 ioc->name));
4996 host_diagnostic &= ~MPI2_DIAG_BOOT_DEVICE_SELECT_MASK;
4997 host_diagnostic |= MPI2_DIAG_BOOT_DEVICE_SELECT_HCDW;
4998 writel(host_diagnostic, &ioc->chip->HostDiagnostic);
4999
5000 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
5001 "re-enable the HCDW\n", ioc->name));
5002 writel(hcb_size | MPI2_HCB_SIZE_HCB_ENABLE,
5003 &ioc->chip->HCBSize);
5004 }
5005
5006 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "restart the adapter\n",
5007 ioc->name));
5008 writel(host_diagnostic & ~MPI2_DIAG_HOLD_IOC_RESET,
5009 &ioc->chip->HostDiagnostic);
5010
5011 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
5012 "disable writes to the diagnostic register\n", ioc->name));
5013 writel(MPI2_WRSEQ_FLUSH_KEY_VALUE, &ioc->chip->WriteSequence);
5014
5015 drsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
5016 "Wait for FW to go to the READY state\n", ioc->name));
5017 ioc_state = _base_wait_on_iocstate(ioc, MPI2_IOC_STATE_READY, 20);
5018 if (ioc_state) {
5019 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT
5020 "%s: failed going to ready state (ioc_state=0x%x)\n",
5021 ioc->name, __func__, ioc_state);
5022 goto out;
5023 }
5024
5025 pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "diag reset: SUCCESS\n", ioc->name);
5026 return 0;
5027
5028 out:
5029 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "diag reset: FAILED\n", ioc->name);
5030 return -EFAULT;
5031}
5032
5033/**
5034 * _base_make_ioc_ready - put controller in READY state
5035 * @ioc: per adapter object
5036 * @type: FORCE_BIG_HAMMER or SOFT_RESET
5037 *
5038 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
5039 */
5040static int
5041_base_make_ioc_ready(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc, enum reset_type type)
5042{
5043 u32 ioc_state;
5044 int rc;
5045 int count;
5046
5047 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
5048 __func__));
5049
5050 if (ioc->pci_error_recovery)
5051 return 0;
5052
5053 ioc_state = mpt3sas_base_get_iocstate(ioc, 0);
5054 dhsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: ioc_state(0x%08x)\n",
5055 ioc->name, __func__, ioc_state));
5056
5057 /* if in RESET state, it should move to READY state shortly */
5058 count = 0;
5059 if ((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) == MPI2_IOC_STATE_RESET) {
5060 while ((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) !=
5061 MPI2_IOC_STATE_READY) {
5062 if (count++ == 10) {
5063 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT
5064 "%s: failed going to ready state (ioc_state=0x%x)\n",
5065 ioc->name, __func__, ioc_state);
5066 return -EFAULT;
5067 }
5068 ssleep(1);
5069 ioc_state = mpt3sas_base_get_iocstate(ioc, 0);
5070 }
5071 }
5072
5073 if ((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) == MPI2_IOC_STATE_READY)
5074 return 0;
5075
5076 if (ioc_state & MPI2_DOORBELL_USED) {
5077 dhsprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
5078 "unexpected doorbell active!\n",
5079 ioc->name));
5080 goto issue_diag_reset;
5081 }
5082
5083 if ((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) == MPI2_IOC_STATE_FAULT) {
5084 mpt3sas_base_fault_info(ioc, ioc_state &
5085 MPI2_DOORBELL_DATA_MASK);
5086 goto issue_diag_reset;
5087 }
5088
5089 if (type == FORCE_BIG_HAMMER)
5090 goto issue_diag_reset;
5091
5092 if ((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) == MPI2_IOC_STATE_OPERATIONAL)
5093 if (!(_base_send_ioc_reset(ioc,
5094 MPI2_FUNCTION_IOC_MESSAGE_UNIT_RESET, 15))) {
5095 return 0;
5096 }
5097
5098 issue_diag_reset:
5099 rc = _base_diag_reset(ioc);
5100 return rc;
5101}
5102
5103/**
5104 * _base_make_ioc_operational - put controller in OPERATIONAL state
5105 * @ioc: per adapter object
5106 *
5107 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
5108 */
5109static int
5110_base_make_ioc_operational(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
5111{
5112 int r, i, index;
5113 unsigned long flags;
5114 u32 reply_address;
5115 u16 smid;
5116 struct _tr_list *delayed_tr, *delayed_tr_next;
5117 struct _sc_list *delayed_sc, *delayed_sc_next;
5118 struct _event_ack_list *delayed_event_ack, *delayed_event_ack_next;
5119 u8 hide_flag;
5120 struct adapter_reply_queue *reply_q;
5121 Mpi2ReplyDescriptorsUnion_t *reply_post_free_contig;
5122
5123 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
5124 __func__));
5125
5126 /* clean the delayed target reset list */
5127 list_for_each_entry_safe(delayed_tr, delayed_tr_next,
5128 &ioc->delayed_tr_list, list) {
5129 list_del(&delayed_tr->list);
5130 kfree(delayed_tr);
5131 }
5132
5133
5134 list_for_each_entry_safe(delayed_tr, delayed_tr_next,
5135 &ioc->delayed_tr_volume_list, list) {
5136 list_del(&delayed_tr->list);
5137 kfree(delayed_tr);
5138 }
5139
5140 list_for_each_entry_safe(delayed_sc, delayed_sc_next,
5141 &ioc->delayed_sc_list, list) {
5142 list_del(&delayed_sc->list);
5143 kfree(delayed_sc);
5144 }
5145
5146 list_for_each_entry_safe(delayed_event_ack, delayed_event_ack_next,
5147 &ioc->delayed_event_ack_list, list) {
5148 list_del(&delayed_event_ack->list);
5149 kfree(delayed_event_ack);
5150 }
5151
5152 /* initialize the scsi lookup free list */
5153 spin_lock_irqsave(&ioc->scsi_lookup_lock, flags);
5154 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ioc->free_list);
5155 smid = 1;
5156 for (i = 0; i < ioc->scsiio_depth; i++, smid++) {
5157 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ioc->scsi_lookup[i].chain_list);
5158 ioc->scsi_lookup[i].cb_idx = 0xFF;
5159 ioc->scsi_lookup[i].smid = smid;
5160 ioc->scsi_lookup[i].scmd = NULL;
5161 ioc->scsi_lookup[i].direct_io = 0;
5162 list_add_tail(&ioc->scsi_lookup[i].tracker_list,
5163 &ioc->free_list);
5164 }
5165
5166 /* hi-priority queue */
5167 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ioc->hpr_free_list);
5168 smid = ioc->hi_priority_smid;
5169 for (i = 0; i < ioc->hi_priority_depth; i++, smid++) {
5170 ioc->hpr_lookup[i].cb_idx = 0xFF;
5171 ioc->hpr_lookup[i].smid = smid;
5172 list_add_tail(&ioc->hpr_lookup[i].tracker_list,
5173 &ioc->hpr_free_list);
5174 }
5175
5176 /* internal queue */
5177 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ioc->internal_free_list);
5178 smid = ioc->internal_smid;
5179 for (i = 0; i < ioc->internal_depth; i++, smid++) {
5180 ioc->internal_lookup[i].cb_idx = 0xFF;
5181 ioc->internal_lookup[i].smid = smid;
5182 list_add_tail(&ioc->internal_lookup[i].tracker_list,
5183 &ioc->internal_free_list);
5184 }
5185
5186 /* chain pool */
5187 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ioc->free_chain_list);
5188 for (i = 0; i < ioc->chain_depth; i++)
5189 list_add_tail(&ioc->chain_lookup[i].tracker_list,
5190 &ioc->free_chain_list);
5191
5192 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&ioc->scsi_lookup_lock, flags);
5193
5194 /* initialize Reply Free Queue */
5195 for (i = 0, reply_address = (u32)ioc->reply_dma ;
5196 i < ioc->reply_free_queue_depth ; i++, reply_address +=
5197 ioc->reply_sz)
5198 ioc->reply_free[i] = cpu_to_le32(reply_address);
5199
5200 /* initialize reply queues */
5201 if (ioc->is_driver_loading)
5202 _base_assign_reply_queues(ioc);
5203
5204 /* initialize Reply Post Free Queue */
5205 index = 0;
5206 reply_post_free_contig = ioc->reply_post[0].reply_post_free;
5207 list_for_each_entry(reply_q, &ioc->reply_queue_list, list) {
5208 /*
5209 * If RDPQ is enabled, switch to the next allocation.
5210 * Otherwise advance within the contiguous region.
5211 */
5212 if (ioc->rdpq_array_enable) {
5213 reply_q->reply_post_free =
5214 ioc->reply_post[index++].reply_post_free;
5215 } else {
5216 reply_q->reply_post_free = reply_post_free_contig;
5217 reply_post_free_contig += ioc->reply_post_queue_depth;
5218 }
5219
5220 reply_q->reply_post_host_index = 0;
5221 for (i = 0; i < ioc->reply_post_queue_depth; i++)
5222 reply_q->reply_post_free[i].Words =
5223 cpu_to_le64(ULLONG_MAX);
5224 if (!_base_is_controller_msix_enabled(ioc))
5225 goto skip_init_reply_post_free_queue;
5226 }
5227 skip_init_reply_post_free_queue:
5228
5229 r = _base_send_ioc_init(ioc);
5230 if (r)
5231 return r;
5232
5233 /* initialize reply free host index */
5234 ioc->reply_free_host_index = ioc->reply_free_queue_depth - 1;
5235 writel(ioc->reply_free_host_index, &ioc->chip->ReplyFreeHostIndex);
5236
5237 /* initialize reply post host index */
5238 list_for_each_entry(reply_q, &ioc->reply_queue_list, list) {
5239 if (ioc->combined_reply_queue)
5240 writel((reply_q->msix_index & 7)<<
5241 MPI2_RPHI_MSIX_INDEX_SHIFT,
5242 ioc->replyPostRegisterIndex[reply_q->msix_index/8]);
5243 else
5244 writel(reply_q->msix_index <<
5245 MPI2_RPHI_MSIX_INDEX_SHIFT,
5246 &ioc->chip->ReplyPostHostIndex);
5247
5248 if (!_base_is_controller_msix_enabled(ioc))
5249 goto skip_init_reply_post_host_index;
5250 }
5251
5252 skip_init_reply_post_host_index:
5253
5254 _base_unmask_interrupts(ioc);
5255 r = _base_event_notification(ioc);
5256 if (r)
5257 return r;
5258
5259 _base_static_config_pages(ioc);
5260
5261 if (ioc->is_driver_loading) {
5262
5263 if (ioc->is_warpdrive && ioc->manu_pg10.OEMIdentifier
5264 == 0x80) {
5265 hide_flag = (u8) (
5266 le32_to_cpu(ioc->manu_pg10.OEMSpecificFlags0) &
5267 MFG_PAGE10_HIDE_SSDS_MASK);
5268 if (hide_flag != MFG_PAGE10_HIDE_SSDS_MASK)
5269 ioc->mfg_pg10_hide_flag = hide_flag;
5270 }
5271
5272 ioc->wait_for_discovery_to_complete =
5273 _base_determine_wait_on_discovery(ioc);
5274
5275 return r; /* scan_start and scan_finished support */
5276 }
5277
5278 r = _base_send_port_enable(ioc);
5279 if (r)
5280 return r;
5281
5282 return r;
5283}
5284
5285/**
5286 * mpt3sas_base_free_resources - free resources controller resources
5287 * @ioc: per adapter object
5288 *
5289 * Return nothing.
5290 */
5291void
5292mpt3sas_base_free_resources(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
5293{
5294 dexitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
5295 __func__));
5296
5297 /* synchronizing freeing resource with pci_access_mutex lock */
5298 mutex_lock(&ioc->pci_access_mutex);
5299 if (ioc->chip_phys && ioc->chip) {
5300 _base_mask_interrupts(ioc);
5301 ioc->shost_recovery = 1;
5302 _base_make_ioc_ready(ioc, SOFT_RESET);
5303 ioc->shost_recovery = 0;
5304 }
5305
5306 mpt3sas_base_unmap_resources(ioc);
5307 mutex_unlock(&ioc->pci_access_mutex);
5308 return;
5309}
5310
5311/**
5312 * mpt3sas_base_attach - attach controller instance
5313 * @ioc: per adapter object
5314 *
5315 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
5316 */
5317int
5318mpt3sas_base_attach(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
5319{
5320 int r, i;
5321 int cpu_id, last_cpu_id = 0;
5322
5323 dinitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
5324 __func__));
5325
5326 /* setup cpu_msix_table */
5327 ioc->cpu_count = num_online_cpus();
5328 for_each_online_cpu(cpu_id)
5329 last_cpu_id = cpu_id;
5330 ioc->cpu_msix_table_sz = last_cpu_id + 1;
5331 ioc->cpu_msix_table = kzalloc(ioc->cpu_msix_table_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5332 ioc->reply_queue_count = 1;
5333 if (!ioc->cpu_msix_table) {
5334 dfailprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
5335 "allocation for cpu_msix_table failed!!!\n",
5336 ioc->name));
5337 r = -ENOMEM;
5338 goto out_free_resources;
5339 }
5340
5341 if (ioc->is_warpdrive) {
5342 ioc->reply_post_host_index = kcalloc(ioc->cpu_msix_table_sz,
5343 sizeof(resource_size_t *), GFP_KERNEL);
5344 if (!ioc->reply_post_host_index) {
5345 dfailprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "allocation "
5346 "for reply_post_host_index failed!!!\n",
5347 ioc->name));
5348 r = -ENOMEM;
5349 goto out_free_resources;
5350 }
5351 }
5352
5353 ioc->rdpq_array_enable_assigned = 0;
5354 ioc->dma_mask = 0;
5355 r = mpt3sas_base_map_resources(ioc);
5356 if (r)
5357 goto out_free_resources;
5358
5359 pci_set_drvdata(ioc->pdev, ioc->shost);
5360 r = _base_get_ioc_facts(ioc);
5361 if (r)
5362 goto out_free_resources;
5363
5364 switch (ioc->hba_mpi_version_belonged) {
5365 case MPI2_VERSION:
5366 ioc->build_sg_scmd = &_base_build_sg_scmd;
5367 ioc->build_sg = &_base_build_sg;
5368 ioc->build_zero_len_sge = &_base_build_zero_len_sge;
5369 break;
5370 case MPI25_VERSION:
5371 case MPI26_VERSION:
5372 /*
5373 * In SAS3.0,
5374 * SCSI_IO, SMP_PASSTHRU, SATA_PASSTHRU, Target Assist, and
5375 * Target Status - all require the IEEE formated scatter gather
5376 * elements.
5377 */
5378 ioc->build_sg_scmd = &_base_build_sg_scmd_ieee;
5379 ioc->build_sg = &_base_build_sg_ieee;
5380 ioc->build_zero_len_sge = &_base_build_zero_len_sge_ieee;
5381 ioc->sge_size_ieee = sizeof(Mpi2IeeeSgeSimple64_t);
5382
5383 break;
5384 }
5385
5386 if (ioc->atomic_desc_capable) {
5387 ioc->put_smid_default = &_base_put_smid_default_atomic;
5388 ioc->put_smid_scsi_io = &_base_put_smid_scsi_io_atomic;
5389 ioc->put_smid_fast_path = &_base_put_smid_fast_path_atomic;
5390 ioc->put_smid_hi_priority = &_base_put_smid_hi_priority_atomic;
5391 } else {
5392 ioc->put_smid_default = &_base_put_smid_default;
5393 ioc->put_smid_scsi_io = &_base_put_smid_scsi_io;
5394 ioc->put_smid_fast_path = &_base_put_smid_fast_path;
5395 ioc->put_smid_hi_priority = &_base_put_smid_hi_priority;
5396 }
5397
5398
5399 /*
5400 * These function pointers for other requests that don't
5401 * the require IEEE scatter gather elements.
5402 *
5403 * For example Configuration Pages and SAS IOUNIT Control don't.
5404 */
5405 ioc->build_sg_mpi = &_base_build_sg;
5406 ioc->build_zero_len_sge_mpi = &_base_build_zero_len_sge;
5407
5408 r = _base_make_ioc_ready(ioc, SOFT_RESET);
5409 if (r)
5410 goto out_free_resources;
5411
5412 ioc->pfacts = kcalloc(ioc->facts.NumberOfPorts,
5413 sizeof(struct mpt3sas_port_facts), GFP_KERNEL);
5414 if (!ioc->pfacts) {
5415 r = -ENOMEM;
5416 goto out_free_resources;
5417 }
5418
5419 for (i = 0 ; i < ioc->facts.NumberOfPorts; i++) {
5420 r = _base_get_port_facts(ioc, i);
5421 if (r)
5422 goto out_free_resources;
5423 }
5424
5425 r = _base_allocate_memory_pools(ioc);
5426 if (r)
5427 goto out_free_resources;
5428
5429 init_waitqueue_head(&ioc->reset_wq);
5430
5431 /* allocate memory pd handle bitmask list */
5432 ioc->pd_handles_sz = (ioc->facts.MaxDevHandle / 8);
5433 if (ioc->facts.MaxDevHandle % 8)
5434 ioc->pd_handles_sz++;
5435 ioc->pd_handles = kzalloc(ioc->pd_handles_sz,
5436 GFP_KERNEL);
5437 if (!ioc->pd_handles) {
5438 r = -ENOMEM;
5439 goto out_free_resources;
5440 }
5441 ioc->blocking_handles = kzalloc(ioc->pd_handles_sz,
5442 GFP_KERNEL);
5443 if (!ioc->blocking_handles) {
5444 r = -ENOMEM;
5445 goto out_free_resources;
5446 }
5447
5448 /* allocate memory for pending OS device add list */
5449 ioc->pend_os_device_add_sz = (ioc->facts.MaxDevHandle / 8);
5450 if (ioc->facts.MaxDevHandle % 8)
5451 ioc->pend_os_device_add_sz++;
5452 ioc->pend_os_device_add = kzalloc(ioc->pend_os_device_add_sz,
5453 GFP_KERNEL);
5454 if (!ioc->pend_os_device_add)
5455 goto out_free_resources;
5456
5457 ioc->device_remove_in_progress_sz = ioc->pend_os_device_add_sz;
5458 ioc->device_remove_in_progress =
5459 kzalloc(ioc->device_remove_in_progress_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5460 if (!ioc->device_remove_in_progress)
5461 goto out_free_resources;
5462
5463 ioc->fwfault_debug = mpt3sas_fwfault_debug;
5464
5465 /* base internal command bits */
5466 mutex_init(&ioc->base_cmds.mutex);
5467 ioc->base_cmds.reply = kzalloc(ioc->reply_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5468 ioc->base_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
5469
5470 /* port_enable command bits */
5471 ioc->port_enable_cmds.reply = kzalloc(ioc->reply_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5472 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
5473
5474 /* transport internal command bits */
5475 ioc->transport_cmds.reply = kzalloc(ioc->reply_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5476 ioc->transport_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
5477 mutex_init(&ioc->transport_cmds.mutex);
5478
5479 /* scsih internal command bits */
5480 ioc->scsih_cmds.reply = kzalloc(ioc->reply_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5481 ioc->scsih_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
5482 mutex_init(&ioc->scsih_cmds.mutex);
5483
5484 /* task management internal command bits */
5485 ioc->tm_cmds.reply = kzalloc(ioc->reply_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5486 ioc->tm_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
5487 mutex_init(&ioc->tm_cmds.mutex);
5488
5489 /* config page internal command bits */
5490 ioc->config_cmds.reply = kzalloc(ioc->reply_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5491 ioc->config_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
5492 mutex_init(&ioc->config_cmds.mutex);
5493
5494 /* ctl module internal command bits */
5495 ioc->ctl_cmds.reply = kzalloc(ioc->reply_sz, GFP_KERNEL);
5496 ioc->ctl_cmds.sense = kzalloc(SCSI_SENSE_BUFFERSIZE, GFP_KERNEL);
5497 ioc->ctl_cmds.status = MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
5498 mutex_init(&ioc->ctl_cmds.mutex);
5499
5500 if (!ioc->base_cmds.reply || !ioc->port_enable_cmds.reply ||
5501 !ioc->transport_cmds.reply || !ioc->scsih_cmds.reply ||
5502 !ioc->tm_cmds.reply || !ioc->config_cmds.reply ||
5503 !ioc->ctl_cmds.reply || !ioc->ctl_cmds.sense) {
5504 r = -ENOMEM;
5505 goto out_free_resources;
5506 }
5507
5508 for (i = 0; i < MPI2_EVENT_NOTIFY_EVENTMASK_WORDS; i++)
5509 ioc->event_masks[i] = -1;
5510
5511 /* here we enable the events we care about */
5512 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_SAS_DISCOVERY);
5513 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_SAS_BROADCAST_PRIMITIVE);
5514 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_SAS_TOPOLOGY_CHANGE_LIST);
5515 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_SAS_DEVICE_STATUS_CHANGE);
5516 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_SAS_ENCL_DEVICE_STATUS_CHANGE);
5517 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_IR_CONFIGURATION_CHANGE_LIST);
5518 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_IR_VOLUME);
5519 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_IR_PHYSICAL_DISK);
5520 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_IR_OPERATION_STATUS);
5521 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_LOG_ENTRY_ADDED);
5522 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_TEMP_THRESHOLD);
5523 if (ioc->hba_mpi_version_belonged == MPI26_VERSION)
5524 _base_unmask_events(ioc, MPI2_EVENT_ACTIVE_CABLE_EXCEPTION);
5525
5526 r = _base_make_ioc_operational(ioc);
5527 if (r)
5528 goto out_free_resources;
5529
5530 ioc->non_operational_loop = 0;
5531 ioc->got_task_abort_from_ioctl = 0;
5532 return 0;
5533
5534 out_free_resources:
5535
5536 ioc->remove_host = 1;
5537
5538 mpt3sas_base_free_resources(ioc);
5539 _base_release_memory_pools(ioc);
5540 pci_set_drvdata(ioc->pdev, NULL);
5541 kfree(ioc->cpu_msix_table);
5542 if (ioc->is_warpdrive)
5543 kfree(ioc->reply_post_host_index);
5544 kfree(ioc->pd_handles);
5545 kfree(ioc->blocking_handles);
5546 kfree(ioc->device_remove_in_progress);
5547 kfree(ioc->pend_os_device_add);
5548 kfree(ioc->tm_cmds.reply);
5549 kfree(ioc->transport_cmds.reply);
5550 kfree(ioc->scsih_cmds.reply);
5551 kfree(ioc->config_cmds.reply);
5552 kfree(ioc->base_cmds.reply);
5553 kfree(ioc->port_enable_cmds.reply);
5554 kfree(ioc->ctl_cmds.reply);
5555 kfree(ioc->ctl_cmds.sense);
5556 kfree(ioc->pfacts);
5557 ioc->ctl_cmds.reply = NULL;
5558 ioc->base_cmds.reply = NULL;
5559 ioc->tm_cmds.reply = NULL;
5560 ioc->scsih_cmds.reply = NULL;
5561 ioc->transport_cmds.reply = NULL;
5562 ioc->config_cmds.reply = NULL;
5563 ioc->pfacts = NULL;
5564 return r;
5565}
5566
5567
5568/**
5569 * mpt3sas_base_detach - remove controller instance
5570 * @ioc: per adapter object
5571 *
5572 * Return nothing.
5573 */
5574void
5575mpt3sas_base_detach(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
5576{
5577 dexitprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s\n", ioc->name,
5578 __func__));
5579
5580 mpt3sas_base_stop_watchdog(ioc);
5581 mpt3sas_base_free_resources(ioc);
5582 _base_release_memory_pools(ioc);
5583 pci_set_drvdata(ioc->pdev, NULL);
5584 kfree(ioc->cpu_msix_table);
5585 if (ioc->is_warpdrive)
5586 kfree(ioc->reply_post_host_index);
5587 kfree(ioc->pd_handles);
5588 kfree(ioc->blocking_handles);
5589 kfree(ioc->device_remove_in_progress);
5590 kfree(ioc->pend_os_device_add);
5591 kfree(ioc->pfacts);
5592 kfree(ioc->ctl_cmds.reply);
5593 kfree(ioc->ctl_cmds.sense);
5594 kfree(ioc->base_cmds.reply);
5595 kfree(ioc->port_enable_cmds.reply);
5596 kfree(ioc->tm_cmds.reply);
5597 kfree(ioc->transport_cmds.reply);
5598 kfree(ioc->scsih_cmds.reply);
5599 kfree(ioc->config_cmds.reply);
5600}
5601
5602/**
5603 * _base_reset_handler - reset callback handler (for base)
5604 * @ioc: per adapter object
5605 * @reset_phase: phase
5606 *
5607 * The handler for doing any required cleanup or initialization.
5608 *
5609 * The reset phase can be MPT3_IOC_PRE_RESET, MPT3_IOC_AFTER_RESET,
5610 * MPT3_IOC_DONE_RESET
5611 *
5612 * Return nothing.
5613 */
5614static void
5615_base_reset_handler(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc, int reset_phase)
5616{
5617 mpt3sas_scsih_reset_handler(ioc, reset_phase);
5618 mpt3sas_ctl_reset_handler(ioc, reset_phase);
5619 switch (reset_phase) {
5620 case MPT3_IOC_PRE_RESET:
5621 dtmprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
5622 "%s: MPT3_IOC_PRE_RESET\n", ioc->name, __func__));
5623 break;
5624 case MPT3_IOC_AFTER_RESET:
5625 dtmprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
5626 "%s: MPT3_IOC_AFTER_RESET\n", ioc->name, __func__));
5627 if (ioc->transport_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_PENDING) {
5628 ioc->transport_cmds.status |= MPT3_CMD_RESET;
5629 mpt3sas_base_free_smid(ioc, ioc->transport_cmds.smid);
5630 complete(&ioc->transport_cmds.done);
5631 }
5632 if (ioc->base_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_PENDING) {
5633 ioc->base_cmds.status |= MPT3_CMD_RESET;
5634 mpt3sas_base_free_smid(ioc, ioc->base_cmds.smid);
5635 complete(&ioc->base_cmds.done);
5636 }
5637 if (ioc->port_enable_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_PENDING) {
5638 ioc->port_enable_failed = 1;
5639 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status |= MPT3_CMD_RESET;
5640 mpt3sas_base_free_smid(ioc, ioc->port_enable_cmds.smid);
5641 if (ioc->is_driver_loading) {
5642 ioc->start_scan_failed =
5643 MPI2_IOCSTATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR;
5644 ioc->start_scan = 0;
5645 ioc->port_enable_cmds.status =
5646 MPT3_CMD_NOT_USED;
5647 } else
5648 complete(&ioc->port_enable_cmds.done);
5649 }
5650 if (ioc->config_cmds.status & MPT3_CMD_PENDING) {
5651 ioc->config_cmds.status |= MPT3_CMD_RESET;
5652 mpt3sas_base_free_smid(ioc, ioc->config_cmds.smid);
5653 ioc->config_cmds.smid = USHRT_MAX;
5654 complete(&ioc->config_cmds.done);
5655 }
5656 break;
5657 case MPT3_IOC_DONE_RESET:
5658 dtmprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT
5659 "%s: MPT3_IOC_DONE_RESET\n", ioc->name, __func__));
5660 break;
5661 }
5662}
5663
5664/**
5665 * mpt3sas_wait_for_commands_to_complete - reset controller
5666 * @ioc: Pointer to MPT_ADAPTER structure
5667 *
5668 * This function waiting(3s) for all pending commands to complete
5669 * prior to putting controller in reset.
5670 */
5671void
5672mpt3sas_wait_for_commands_to_complete(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc)
5673{
5674 u32 ioc_state;
5675 unsigned long flags;
5676 u16 i;
5677
5678 ioc->pending_io_count = 0;
5679
5680 ioc_state = mpt3sas_base_get_iocstate(ioc, 0);
5681 if ((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) != MPI2_IOC_STATE_OPERATIONAL)
5682 return;
5683
5684 /* pending command count */
5685 spin_lock_irqsave(&ioc->scsi_lookup_lock, flags);
5686 for (i = 0; i < ioc->scsiio_depth; i++)
5687 if (ioc->scsi_lookup[i].cb_idx != 0xFF)
5688 ioc->pending_io_count++;
5689 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&ioc->scsi_lookup_lock, flags);
5690
5691 if (!ioc->pending_io_count)
5692 return;
5693
5694 /* wait for pending commands to complete */
5695 wait_event_timeout(ioc->reset_wq, ioc->pending_io_count == 0, 10 * HZ);
5696}
5697
5698/**
5699 * mpt3sas_base_hard_reset_handler - reset controller
5700 * @ioc: Pointer to MPT_ADAPTER structure
5701 * @type: FORCE_BIG_HAMMER or SOFT_RESET
5702 *
5703 * Returns 0 for success, non-zero for failure.
5704 */
5705int
5706mpt3sas_base_hard_reset_handler(struct MPT3SAS_ADAPTER *ioc,
5707 enum reset_type type)
5708{
5709 int r;
5710 unsigned long flags;
5711 u32 ioc_state;
5712 u8 is_fault = 0, is_trigger = 0;
5713
5714 dtmprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: enter\n", ioc->name,
5715 __func__));
5716
5717 if (ioc->pci_error_recovery) {
5718 pr_err(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: pci error recovery reset\n",
5719 ioc->name, __func__);
5720 r = 0;
5721 goto out_unlocked;
5722 }
5723
5724 if (mpt3sas_fwfault_debug)
5725 mpt3sas_halt_firmware(ioc);
5726
5727 /* wait for an active reset in progress to complete */
5728 if (!mutex_trylock(&ioc->reset_in_progress_mutex)) {
5729 do {
5730 ssleep(1);
5731 } while (ioc->shost_recovery == 1);
5732 dtmprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: exit\n", ioc->name,
5733 __func__));
5734 return ioc->ioc_reset_in_progress_status;
5735 }
5736
5737 spin_lock_irqsave(&ioc->ioc_reset_in_progress_lock, flags);
5738 ioc->shost_recovery = 1;
5739 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&ioc->ioc_reset_in_progress_lock, flags);
5740
5741 if ((ioc->diag_buffer_status[MPI2_DIAG_BUF_TYPE_TRACE] &
5742 MPT3_DIAG_BUFFER_IS_REGISTERED) &&
5743 (!(ioc->diag_buffer_status[MPI2_DIAG_BUF_TYPE_TRACE] &
5744 MPT3_DIAG_BUFFER_IS_RELEASED))) {
5745 is_trigger = 1;
5746 ioc_state = mpt3sas_base_get_iocstate(ioc, 0);
5747 if ((ioc_state & MPI2_IOC_STATE_MASK) == MPI2_IOC_STATE_FAULT)
5748 is_fault = 1;
5749 }
5750 _base_reset_handler(ioc, MPT3_IOC_PRE_RESET);
5751 mpt3sas_wait_for_commands_to_complete(ioc);
5752 _base_mask_interrupts(ioc);
5753 r = _base_make_ioc_ready(ioc, type);
5754 if (r)
5755 goto out;
5756 _base_reset_handler(ioc, MPT3_IOC_AFTER_RESET);
5757
5758 /* If this hard reset is called while port enable is active, then
5759 * there is no reason to call make_ioc_operational
5760 */
5761 if (ioc->is_driver_loading && ioc->port_enable_failed) {
5762 ioc->remove_host = 1;
5763 r = -EFAULT;
5764 goto out;
5765 }
5766 r = _base_get_ioc_facts(ioc);
5767 if (r)
5768 goto out;
5769
5770 if (ioc->rdpq_array_enable && !ioc->rdpq_array_capable)
5771 panic("%s: Issue occurred with flashing controller firmware."
5772 "Please reboot the system and ensure that the correct"
5773 " firmware version is running\n", ioc->name);
5774
5775 r = _base_make_ioc_operational(ioc);
5776 if (!r)
5777 _base_reset_handler(ioc, MPT3_IOC_DONE_RESET);
5778
5779 out:
5780 dtmprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: %s\n",
5781 ioc->name, __func__, ((r == 0) ? "SUCCESS" : "FAILED")));
5782
5783 spin_lock_irqsave(&ioc->ioc_reset_in_progress_lock, flags);
5784 ioc->ioc_reset_in_progress_status = r;
5785 ioc->shost_recovery = 0;
5786 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&ioc->ioc_reset_in_progress_lock, flags);
5787 ioc->ioc_reset_count++;
5788 mutex_unlock(&ioc->reset_in_progress_mutex);
5789
5790 out_unlocked:
5791 if ((r == 0) && is_trigger) {
5792 if (is_fault)
5793 mpt3sas_trigger_master(ioc, MASTER_TRIGGER_FW_FAULT);
5794 else
5795 mpt3sas_trigger_master(ioc,
5796 MASTER_TRIGGER_ADAPTER_RESET);
5797 }
5798 dtmprintk(ioc, pr_info(MPT3SAS_FMT "%s: exit\n", ioc->name,
5799 __func__));
5800 return r;
5801}
